item.title: Change xp?
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

then just add this under it for slayer xp

int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.addSkillXP(<amount of XP>, 18);

Read full topic

item.title: Change xp?
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

search for this in your client.java

fightType != 3

and you should be able to find it.

as for specific xp per monster (i.e. slayer xp), search for this in your npchandler.java

public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)

and scroll down just a little and you’ll see the rest of it, looks like this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.addSkillXP(1050, 18); }

Read full topic
